headline: Siemens Unveils Technologies to Accelerate the Industrial AI Revolution at CES 2026
summary: LAS VEGAS, January 06, 2026--At CES 2026, Siemens’ keynote marked a new era of technology for industry and infrastructure, showcasing how customers and partners are harnessing artificial intelligence to transform their businesses. With AI-enabled technologies, deep domain expertise, and trusted partnerships, Siemens is converting this technological leap into measurable benefits for customers, partners, and society.

raw.headline: Siemens Unveils Technologies to Accelerate the Industrial AI Revolution at CES 2026

With AI-enabled technologies, deep domain expertise, and trusted partnerships, Siemens is converting this technological leap into measurable benefits for customers, partners, and society.

headline: Siemens brings the industrial metaverse to life with Digital Twin Composer
summary: Siemens today announced Digital Twin Composer, a new software solution that builds Industrial Metaverse environments at scale, empowering organizations to apply industrial AI, simulation and real-time physical data to make decisions virtually, at speed and at scale.

raw.headline: Siemens brings the industrial metaverse to life with Digital Twin Composer
raw.summary: Siemens today announced Digital Twin Composer, a new software solution that builds Industrial Metaverse environments at scale, empowering organizations to apply industrial AI, simulation and real-time physical data to make decisions virtually, at speed and at scale.

headline: PepsiCo Announces Industry-First AI and Digital Twin Collaboration with Siemens and NVIDIA
summary: At CES 2026, PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) announced a multi-year, industry-first collaboration with Siemens and NVIDIA to transform plant and supply chain operations through advanced digital twin technology and AI. This collaboration marks a first-of-its-kind initiative for a global CPG company applying digital twins to reshape how plant and warehousing facilities are digitally simulated and tested, with early pilots already underway in the U.S.

headline: Princeton in Palm Beach: Yacht Club Cocktails and Lookahead to CorpGov Forum at Reunions 2026
summary: Princeton alumni gathered at the Palm Beach Yacht Club on December 23rd to toast the holiday season and the 2nd Annual Princeton CorpGov Forum, scheduled during 2026 Reunions. The first Princeton CorpGov Forum was hosted together with The New York Stock Exchange and Goldman Sachs, held on May 22, 2025, at The Nassau Inn in […] The post Princeton in Palm Beach: Yacht Club Cocktails and Lookahead to CorpGov Forum at Reunions 2026 appeared first on CorpGov.

headline: PrePublic Equity Partners Spins Out of Top 20 US VC Firm to Democratize Access to Late Stage Venture Secondaries
summary: MANCHESTER, N.H., January 06, 2026--PrePublic Equity Partners (PEP) spun out from Alumni Ventures (Top 20 US VC) to launch and expand access to late-stage venture secondaries.

headline: Shareholder Activism Worked in 2025. The Surge Will Continue This Year.
summary: The number of activist campaigns last year rose to a record 255 worldwide including the U.S., up about 5% from 2024.
